Test 1: Simple procedure pointer
Hello from procedure!
Goodbye from procedure!
Test 2: Procedure pointer with parameter
Integer: 42
Double: 42
Test 3: String parameter procedure pointer
Message: Test message
Test 4: Multi-parameter procedure pointer
Multi: 123, test, true
Multi: 456, hello, false
Test 5: Procedure pointer as parameter
Before execution
Hello from procedure!
After execution
Test 6: Higher-order procedure with parameters
Executing with value: 99
Integer: 99
Executing with value: 50
Double: 100
All procedure pointer tests completed
